meanings.sent1: She always gives an unbiassed opinion on important matters.
meanings.sent2: The unbiassed judge made a fair decision in the court case.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed unbiassed when choosing between two identical toys.
meanings.sent4: The clear sky was unbiassed, showing no favoritism towards any particular cloud.
meanings.sent5: His unbiassed approach to problem-solving made him a valuable team member.

meanings.sent1: The unbiassed referee made a just call during the game.
meanings.sent2: It is important for a leader to be unbiassed when making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The unbiassed scale always gave the same weight to both sides of the argument.
meanings.sent4: Her unbiassed nature was like a beacon of light in a sea of bias.
meanings.sent5: The unbiassed investigation revealed the truth behind the mysterious disappearance.
